certificate.name: Unit 1 Certificate for Instructors
certificate.intro:
Follow the instructions on screen to view or print your certificate.  

You have met the requirements for a Certificate of Completion for this unit. Save or print this certificate for your records.

Click ELLLangNeeds in the Navigation pane to the left of the screen or in the breadcrumbs near the top of the screen to select your next activity.
certificate.customtext: Meeting Language Needs: Increasing Rigor for ELA
